external_games.name: Train Simulator: BR Class 58 Loco Add-On

name: Train Simulator: BR Class 58 Loco Add-On
summary: The distinctive Class 58, nicknamed the 'Bone' because of its unusual shape with a wide cab at either end, is now available to lend some serious hauling power in Train Simulator. The Class 58 was built between 1983 and 1987 by BREL in Doncaster Works as British Rail wanted a new freight locomotive that would be lower in cost and...
